sqlMap.select:
SELECT MEM_CODE, NAME, BIRTHDAY, CONTACT, ADDR, EMAIL, ID, GENDER FROM MEM
NAME LIKE '%' || #content# || '%'
ID LIKE '%' || #content# || '%'
CONTACT LIKE '%' || #content# || '%'
ORDER BY LENGTH(MEM_CODE), MEM_CODE
SELECT MEM_CODE, NAME, BIRTHDAY, CONTACT, ADDR, EMAIL, ID, GENDER FROM MEM WHERE MEM_CODE = #mem_code#
SELECT MEM_CODE, NAME, BIRTHDAY, CONTACT, ADDR, EMAIL, ID, GENDER FROM MEM WHERE NAME LIKE '%' || #name# || '%'
SELECT MEM_CODE, NAME, BIRTHDAY, CONTACT, ADDR, EMAIL, ID, GENDER FROM MEM WHERE ID LIKE '%' || #id# || '%'
SELECT MEM_CODE, NAME, BIRTHDAY, CONTACT, ADDR, EMAIL, ID, GENDER FROM MEM WHERE CONTACT = #contact#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MEM SET NAME = #name#, BIRTHDAY = #birthday#, CONTACT = #contact#, ADDR = #addr#, EMAIL = #email#, ID = #id#, GENDER = #gender# WHERE MEM_CODE = #mem_code#
